= IMAP folder management example =
{{{
s: 2 OK AUTHENTICATE completed
c: 3 CREATE "test/test2"
s: 3 OK CREATE completed
c: 4 LSUB "" "*"
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" INBOX
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" "Sent Items"
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" VOICEMAIL
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" Spam
s: * LSUB (\HasChildren) "/" Saved
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" Drafts
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" Trash
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" Saved/SavedIMs
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" afolder
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" Saved/test
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" test/test2
s: 4 OK LSUB completed
c: 5 RENAME "test/test2" "test/test3"
s: 5 OK RENAME completed
c: 6 LSUB "" "*"
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" INBOX
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" "Sent Items"
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" VOICEMAIL
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" Spam
s: * LSUB (\HasChildren) "/" Saved
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" Drafts
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" Trash
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" Saved/SavedIMs
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" afolder
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" Saved/test
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" test/test3
s: 6 OK LSUB completed
c: 7 DELETE "test/test3"
s: 7 OK DELETE completed
c: 8 LSUB "" "*"
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" INBOX
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" "Sent Items"
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" VOICEMAIL
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" Spam
s: * LSUB (\HasChildren) "/" Saved
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" Drafts
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" Trash
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" Saved/SavedIMs
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" afolder
s: * LSUB (\HasNoChildren \Noinferiors) "/" Saved/test
s: 8 OK LSUB completed
}}}
